alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 10:53PM CDT until June 14 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BRADLEY...SOUTHEASTERN CLEVELAND AND NORTHEASTERN CALHOUN COUNTIES... At 1053 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ellisville, or near Fordyce, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Warren... Marks Mill State Park... Ellisville... Weeks... Hebron... Tipton... Herbine... Chambersville... Orlando... Pansy... New Edinburg... Rye... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
